name: Angry Piano
description:
Follow the rhythm of the music without touching the white keys and break your own record on Angry Piano.

Choose your gameplay mode, and show the world who the best pianist is.

3 levels of play (Arcade Mode)

How many keys can you play without messing up?

-Normal: Perfect speed for beginners and those who want to take it easy

-Faster: Demonstrate your superior hand-eye coordination.

-Reverse: Turn the game upside down and play the keys from top to bottom. Craziness!

3 levels of gameplay (Classic Mode)

The clock is ticking. Be the fastest to play a complete song.

-25 key song

-50 key song

-Pro: Discover how many keys you have left to play.

Try your luck at Angry Piano and share your score on Facebook and Twitter.

If you like the game, don't forget to rate it. We look forward to reading your comments and recommendations.
